description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A new twist on a classic game, SnakeMan is an action-packed puzzler. Snake around twisting levels eating food and growing longer and faster. How long can you get? Can you catch the mouse? Includes shared high scores list and awardments.
description.short: A new twist on a classic game, SnakeMan is an action-packed puzzler. Snake around twisting levels eating food and growing longer and faster. How long can you get? Can you catch the mouse? Includes shared high scores list and awardments.
